cast.name: 伊琳娜·维克托洛娃 Irina Viktorova
玛丽亚·罗切娃 Mariya Rocheva
安菲萨·哈利扎诺瓦 Anfisa Kharizanova
安德烈·奥尔罗夫 Andrey Orlov

director.name: 小弗拉基米尔·纳哈布采夫 Vladimir nakhabtsev jr.

introduction: After the suicide of former head of the ainzatsgroup of ss mankevich lieutenant colonel andrei eliseev takes on the search for war criminals from his group. Untangling the chain of mysterious events of the past and present, eliseev, together with the staff of the department, establishes that in August 1941 in the building of the museum there was a group of mankevich's guards, where hid a group of children from the orphanage, abandoned during the evacuation. After mankevich's group, the children disappeared. With the help of alex lute's secret archive eliseev finds out who was in the squad. But all the remaining members of the squad die under mysterious circumstances.
